Articles.Content:
This is the list of mods and plugins that I am using right now. I am still on .23.5 because not all of the mods that I do use have been updated to .24 at this time, but I do plan on upgrading and maybe doing my first Career . I'm not really sure about adding any life support mods and I'm also looking at starting my first Mission Report, so if anyone has any suggestions to this mod list (being that I am no longer going to be limited to 4gb of ram W00T!) please let me know!

Edited July 21, 2014 by uncle natzer

Edit:

So I just noticed that I didn't post the list on here...... Kinda needed to do that......

----Mod List----

*AIES Aerospace (updated)

*Toolbar (updated)

Active Texture Managment?

ALCOR

B9 Aerospace

EVE Astronomer Pack

Crew Manifest

*Deadly Reentry (updated)

Distant Object

*Dmagic Orbital Science (updated)

ExsurgentEngineering.dll

Firespitter.dll

FusTek (needs updating)

KS Industries

THSS (needs updated mod/updating)

Raster Prop Moniter JSI

KAS

Procedural Fairings

*Kerbal Joint Reinforcement (updated)

*Kethain (updated)

KinTechAnimations.dll

KW Rocketry

*MechJeb2 (updated)

Mods By Tal (tet and sphere tanks)

Mod Statistics

Hot Rockets

Final Frontier

NothkeSerCom (Service Compartment Tubes)

Nova Punch

*Chatterer RMB (updated)

*Real Chute (updated)

Romfarer

*SCANsat (updated)

SmokeScreen.dll

Spaceplane Plus

Tac Fuel Balancer

*Kerbal Alarm Clock (updated)

Vessel View

CommandpodMechJeb2.cfg

*Module Manager 2.2.0 (updated)

The ones I recommend to everyone are Kerbal alarm clock (prevents you from warping past nodes and other things, invaluable when doing several missions at once) and Enhanced Navball (shows normal and radial vectors in addition to prograde/retrograde).
